concept.title: Viewing Raw JSON Data
concept.shortdesc: You can view the JSON data that the console uses to generate displays. You can generate the raw JSON data when requested by a StreamSets client services member to help troubleshoot a problem.

p.draft-comment: access point, different types. move the following into a subheading?

conbody.p:
You can view different types of JSON data based on where you are in the console. The following table lists the types of JSON data that you can generate:
Configuring a Pipeline Pipeline Configuration
Pipeline Rules
Definitions
Previewing a Pipeline Pipeline Preview
Monitoring a Pipeline Pipeline Monitoring
Pipeline Status
Pipeline Configuration
Pipeline Rules
Definitions
Viewing JVM Metrics JVM Metrics

The provides the following JSON data:
Pipeline Configuration -
Pipeline Rules -
Definitions -
Pipeline Preview -
Pipeline Monitoring -
Pipeline Status -
JVM Metrics -
